  <br>
  <h1>@choco/i18n</h1>
  <p>
    Load .env for monorepos.
  </p>
</div>

<h2 align="center">Install</h2>

```bash
yarn add @choco/env
```

<h2 align="center">Usage</h2>

```javascript
import '@choco/env'
```
